html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-06612024-06-10PS, CBSA
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (Transborder Criminality)
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS (TRANSBORDER CRIMINALITY) in order to (1) list specific offences in the regulations which would only be those that could occur at a port of entry, and only those severe enough to warrant a transborder criminal inadmissibility finding; and (2) transfer authority to issue removal orders from the Immigration Division to the Minister’s Delegate for straightforward offences committed at the time of entry.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0128 Publication Date: 2024-06-19
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS (TRANSBORDER CRIMINALITY) in order to (1) list specific offences in the regulations which would only be those that could occur at a port of entry, and only those severe enough to warrant a transborder criminal inadmissibility finding; and (2) transfer authority to issue removal orders from the Immigration Division to the Minister’s Delegate for straightforward offences committed at the time of entry.
